job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job Description DevOps style SREs with the skills listed below Distributed systems knowledge like Hadoop/HBase, Kafka etc Average coder in Java. Python + Shell scripting knowledge is a plus. Production maintenance experience. Basic Kubernetes knowledge. Telemetry domain knowledge is huge plus. Hubble expertise Responsibilities Production maintenance and on-call. Debug and fix Java code. Help customer support team in answering few complicated user questions. Improve automation and tooling.
